div.p: Rate constants for the reaction of the F atom with H 2 (green color) and D 2 (blue color) molecules on the SW PES [panel (A)] and PES-II [panel (B)]. The solid lines show the numerically exact results obtained by rigorous quantum reactive scattering calculations (Equation 7). The dashed lines depict the Bell approximation (Equation 11). The dot-dashed lines show the Wigner limit (Equation 10).
